creditline: The John R. Van Derlip Fund and the Mary Griggs Burke Endowment Fund established by the Mary Livingston Griggs and Mary Griggs Burke Foundation; purchase from the Thomas Murray Collection
description: navy blue sleeves and collar; upper half of main body is off white with navy diamond and circle pattern; lower half of body is navy with horizontal line patter of small, off white stitches; blue square patch on either hip
markings: Thomas Murray Collection label bottom PR: JAP 6084
medium: Cloth: cotton and hemp; sashiko (decorative reinforcement stitching), katazome (stencil resist), indigo dye
title: Woman’s workwear (noragi) jacket with kogin embroidery made in the Tōhoku Region
